column29: By 2020, the BMW Group will have reduced CO2 emissions in the European new vehicle fleet (EU-28) by at least 50% compared to the base year (1995). In recent years, we have steadily reduced the CO2 emissions of our vehicle fleet and achieved a decrease of around 40 per cent between 1990 and 2019. In 2020, we will once again lower our carbon emissions in Europe significantly, with a decrease of around 20 per cent from the previous year. This means we plan to meet Europe’s ambitious CO2 targets for 2020 and 2021.
